title: Save 30% on this 6-port Anker charging station that doubles as a power meter
description: Macworld Anker’s Prime Charge is a sure way to keep your devices charged at all times and keep your desk tidy. Since it’s on sale for Prime members for just $119, down from its $170 MSRP, now’s the best time to get one. First of all, this is a fairly small device, so it won’t take up a ton of space. It’s also rather stylish, featuring a small display on the front, where you can check on the charging status and speeds, as well as the date and time. There are also four Type-C ports right below the display so you can plug in your various devices and two USB-A on the side. Also on the right side of the device is a smart control dial that allows you to adjust the energy output so all of your devices charge at optimal speed. You do that by swapping between various modes, such as AI Power, port priority, dual-laptop, and low current. Talking of which, you can even use this Anker model and its maximum 250W total output to fast charge your laptop via that first USB-C port which can go as high as 140W. So there you have it, go ahead and charge your MacBook, your iPhone, and whatever else you need with this highly discounted Anker Prime Charger. The Anker Prime charger can recharge 6 devices at onceBuy it now at Amazon

html:
Image: Anker

Anker’s Prime Charge is a sure way to keep your devices charged at all times and keep your desk tidy. Since it’s on sale for Prime members for just $119, down from its $170 MSRP, now’s the best time to get one.

First of all, this is a fairly small device, so it won’t take up a ton of space. It’s also rather stylish, featuring a small display on the front, where you can check on the charging status and speeds, as well as the date and time.

There are also four Type-C ports right below the display so you can plug in your various devices and two USB-A on the side. Also on the right side of the device is a smart control dial that allows you to adjust the energy output so all of your devices charge at optimal speed. You do that by swapping between various modes, such as AI Power, port priority, dual-laptop, and low current.

Talking of which, you can even use this Anker model and its maximum 250W total output to fast charge your laptop via that first USB-C port which can go as high as 140W.

So there you have it, go ahead and charge your MacBook, your iPhone, and whatever else you need with this highly discounted Anker Prime Charger.

The Anker Prime charger can recharge 6 devices at once
